select IFNULL(count(id),0) from recharge_bill where user_info_id = #{user_info_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and recharge_status = 1 and recharge_status = 2 and recharge_status = 3 and recharge_status in (2,3)
select IFNULL(count(id),0) from recharge_bill where recharge_status = 1
select IFNULL(count(id),0) from recharge_bill where recharge_status = 2 and verified_time >= #{td,jdbcType=DATE}
select IFNULL(sum(rmb_amount),0) from recharge_bill where recharge_status = 2 and verified_time >= #{td,jdbcType=DATE}
select IFNULL(sum(rmb_amount),0) from recharge_bill where recharge_status = 2
